title: Levin, Harkin, Coburn Among Senators Bidding Adieu
teaser: The end of the 113th Congress means a lot of goodbyes for retiring members and for those who lost in November. That means, at least for a moment, partisanship took some time off on the Senate floor.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
